MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL57 postcode area of Bangor, affecting properties in Ffordd Caernarfon, Cyttir Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:54pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a grounded overhead line. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:07pm on 30th January 2021.
